name: jauntiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of seeming happy and confident: The natural jauntiness remained in her step. I love the jauntiness of the rhythm. See
jaunty
More examplesFewer examples"Hi," she said with unconvincing jauntiness.When we next saw him, he had recovered his jauntiness.The music has a certain pop jauntiness.
